After walking by several times in the evening after closing hours, I had a free morning and swung by Green Shoots to check out their juice selection.  They have a very large selection of green (and non-green) juices and smoothies and the women at the register was incredibly friendly and had an English menu ready in case I didn't understand the ingredient lists for each drink.The juice I selected had celery, cucumber, pineapple and apple and was very tasty.  She freshly made it after I ordered it and it just slightly chilled when she handed it to me.  I also was enticed by the delicious smelling quiche that they had on the table next to the register and after some deliberation selected a slice of the zucchini, sun dried tomato and goat cheese quiche.  The quiche was pretty good though the crust had gotten a little bit soggy.There is ample seating and free wifi so it felt very warm and welcoming.  They let me sit and read my book while I slowly enjoyed my juice and quiche and were in no rush for me to leave, which I really appreciated.  If I'm in the area I would definitely return again!  Bonus points for them accepting credit card.
